dict.string: Kairos needs local network access to connect to your development server for testing.
Kairos needs full calendar access to add confirmed events and provide the best experience for managing your scheduled meetups.
Kairos syncs your contacts to help you find friends who are already using the app and make it easier to plan together.
Kairos uses your location to show nearby places for meeting up with friends.
Amiqo needs microphone access for voice-activated planning. Speak your plans naturally and Amiqo will help coordinate.
Amiqo uses speech recognition to understand your planning requests. All processing happens on your device for privacy.
